text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale!) Iru kuttattarum (uhutu porukkakac) cantitta nalil unkalil evarkal atiliruntu veruntotinarkalo, (avarkal nirakarippin karanamaka otavillai.) Avarkal ceyta cila tavarukalin karanamaka saittantan avarkalutaiya kalkalaic carukkumpatic ceytan. Eninum, allah avarkalin kurrankalai mannittuvittan. Niccayamaka allah mika mannippavan, mikka porumaiyutaiyavan avan
